headline: The VASSAL Team is happy to announce VASSAL {{version}}.
important: NEW! 64-bit ARM packages: There are now MacOS and Windows packages for 64-bit ARM processors. If you have a Mac with an Apple Silicon CPU (which is a 64-bit ARM processor), we recommend using the 64-bit ARM build.
Code deprecated more than a year ago has been removed. Modules containing custom code using that code MUST be updated if they are to work with {{version_feature}}.
Things may be broken which worked previously. If you find a new bug, please report it.

Modules saved in {{version_feature}} are not openable by earlier versions of VASSAL. We recommend keeping a backup copy of any pre-{{version_feature}} modules you plan to modify in {{version_feature}} until you've verified that everything works to your satisfaction.

bug_fixes.desc: System.setProperty() in BugDialog throws if the value is null
Fixed incorrect properties file path, which prevents working on translations
Dereference symbolic link to executable before attemping to find install dir
Prevent clearing the tile cache when a module is open
Closing a reopenable Map should not close game
Global Option List Preferences not initialising Global Property correctly
Broken links to and within Reference Manual
Closing game should reset multiplayer flag for console
Display translated Basic Piece/Basic Name in Scrollable lists in Game Piece Palette
Cancel key in Multi-Piece Editor (Edit all contained pieces) correctly backs out with no changes
Piece dropped into incorrect position in the stack when dragging within a stack to a lower position
Piece "disappears" when dragged to grid space with an existing stack and "snap to defined point"
Updated Opt-in version of the 'Leading Zeros in Integers' handing
Safer GKC Configurer for Fixed # From Deck

other_improvements.desc: Updated bundled Java to 19 for Windows and MacOS
Irregular Grid editor - add region with Insert or Ctrl+Right Click
Added support for Open Recent... submenu
Player context menus: Show keyboard shortcuts right-aligned and with symbols
Update Module Extension window, add missing description
Prevent Notes windows always starting open at very last character of note
Auto-select contents of Edit boxes when they get focus

Default dialog-closing button behaviors for Enter/Esc; Key shortcuts added to Piece Definer (see Game Piece help); Piece Definer list boxes jump to entry starting with that letter; Key shortcuts added editing Layer trait (see Layer help); Most text fields support Ctrl/Cmd+Z for undo/redo
Description of Prototype will auto-include any BasicName
Add hotkey to start specific chess clock
Add Open all Contained Pieces option
Option to 'always use format' on text label (even if label is blank)
BoundsTracker - Track bounds and repaint just for the regions of added pieces; rather than the whole map
TurnTracker Forward Only Toggle: Allow module designers to disable the backwards TurnTracker button
Don't play sounds while fast-forwarding a log
